snippet.title: The Dark Mod Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Home Page: http://www.thedarkmod.com
Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=858048394
Narrator: http://www.everybodyandme.com/
Music: Schatten - Nocturne
Video: Recorded, directed and edited by Goldwell

Please follow us on twitter and facebook
Twitter: https://twitter.com/thedarkmod
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/The-Dark-Mod-188641261206944/

A huge thank you to the following forum members for their help with translations:

Anderson - Russian and Romanian
Gast - French
Judith - Polish
Muleke_Trairao - Brazilian Portuguese
Obsttorte - German
Outsider One - Turkish
Taquito - Spanish
